About Us
About Jesse's
Sports Bar & Grill
Welcome to Jesse’s Sports Bar & Grill your Margate’s favorite hangout where the good times roll and the drinks are always flowing!
We’re proud to be Margate community hub where everyone feels welcome, from die-hard sports fans to families enjoying a night out.
Game on!
Challenge your buddies to a round of pool on our classic tables, show off your skills at our pro-level dart board, or jam out to your favorite tunes on our TouchTunes jukebox. We’ve even got video games for those who want to level up their fun!
Sports Central
Die-hard fan? We’ve got you covered. Catch all the latest games on our big screens while you chow down on delicious eats from our full bar and kitchen. Craving a legendary cheesesteak or some flavor-packed wings? Look no further – our menu’s got the goods, from classic bar bites to hearty meals to satisfy any craving.
More Than a Bar
Next door, you’ll find our well-stocked Jesse’s Liquor Store with an impressive selection that even rivals big-name chains! Find everything from budget-friendly options to premium spirits, rare finds, and a unique collection of Delta-8 products.
Jesse's time machine
Come on down!
Discover why Jesse’s Sports Bar & Grill is more than just a bar – it’s the Margate hangout where the good times roll!
Order Online
.entry-content
About Jesse's
Sports Bar & Grill
Welcome to Jesse’s Sports Bar & Grill your Margate’s favorite hangout where the good times roll and the drinks are always flowing!
We’re proud to be Margate community hub where everyone feels welcome, from die-hard sports fans to families enjoying a night out.
Game on!
Challenge your buddies to a round of pool on our classic tables, show off your skills at our pro-level dart board, or jam out to your favorite tunes on our TouchTunes jukebox. We’ve even got video games for those who want to level up their fun!
Sports Central
Die-hard fan? We’ve got you covered. Catch all the latest games on our big screens while you chow down on delicious eats from our full bar and kitchen. Craving a legendary cheesesteak or some flavor-packed wings? Look no further – our menu’s got the goods, from classic bar bites to hearty meals to satisfy any craving.

Next door, you’ll find our well-stocked Jesse’s Liquor Store with an impressive selection that even rivals big-name chains! Find everything from budget-friendly options to premium spirits, rare finds, and a unique collection of Delta-8 products.

Jesse's Xtreme Sports Bar
526 Google reviews
Write a review
Alan Sarikelle
2025-01-19
Trustindex verifies that the original source of the review is Google.
R-CONTENT
Neighborhood bar
R-CONTENT
Marc Jeanbaptiste
2025-01-02
Trustindex verifies that the original source of the review is Google.
R-CONTENT
The food is great and the service is great , I come here with my girlfriend all the time we’re regulars and we love our service. One of our favorite bartenders is JMoney! She is amazing ! . Service is always great with punctuality and she is very friendly, easy going and makes us feel welcomed everytime ! We love her .
R-CONTENT
Indya Evans
2025-01-02
Trustindex verifies that the original source of the review is Google.
R-CONTENT
JMoney is one of my favorite Bartenders! Every time I come, she always remembers my name and is very sweet and has an awesome smile! Very welcoming!
R-CONTENT
erindi e
2024-12-24
Trustindex verifies that the original source of the review is Google.
R-CONTENT
Great place with amazing food and great people.
The price are really fair and we had a great time.
R-CONTENT
Kev Gir
2024-12-05
Trustindex verifies that the original source of the review is Google.
R-CONTENT
My first time coming here was back in 2010, I moved away for a while then in 2023 I pop my head in here to see how it was. The same welcoming feeling I felt years back. All the food is superb. Chefs Kayla and Raz are perfectionists. Love the ranch chicken Philly Wrap! The staff is friendly and great to be around. No matter who serves you, you’ll be taken care of. Munson, Jenn, Brittany, Booze, Ally, Matt, Christina etc!
R-CONTENT
christophe graham
2024-12-04
Trustindex verifies that the original source of the review is Google.
R-CONTENT
Great food. Great people. Awesome staff
R-CONTENT
Andrew Mackey
2024-11-30
Trustindex verifies that the original source of the review is Google.
R-CONTENT
Wow, what a pleasant surprise. I thought this was just another dive bar, I could not be more wrong. Grabbed a cold beer and a steak and cheese and it was incredible.  But listen, I can get good food anywhere, when it comes to the service, that's what put this place over the top. My bartenders Munson, Jen & Brittnee were not only knowledgeable and suggestive, but super nice and conversational.  Looking forward to making this my regular stop.
R-CONTENT
Jesse's Xtreme Sports Bar

From live sports watch parties and themed trivia nights to unbeatable food and drink specials, there’s always something happening at Jesse’s Xtreme Sports Bar & Grill! Don’t miss the action—check our calendar and join the fun with your crew!

My first time coming here was back in 2010, I moved away for a while then in 2023 I pop my head in here to see how it was. The same welcoming feeling I felt years back. All the food is superb. Chefs Kayla and Raz are perfectionists. Love the ranch chicken Philly Wrap! The staff is friendly and great to be around. No matter who serves you, you’ll be taken care of. Munson, Jenn, Brittany, Booze, Ally, Matt, Christina etc!

Wow, what a pleasant surprise. I thought this was just another dive bar, I could not be more wrong. Grabbed a cold beer and a steak and cheese and it was incredible.  But listen, I can get good food anywhere, when it comes to the service, that's what put this place over the top. My bartenders Munson, Jen & Brittnee were not only knowledgeable and suggestive, but super nice and conversational.  Looking forward to making this my regular stop.
R-CONTENT
